thread.title: Insurer Principal Financial to Buy Fintech Firm

author: Lisa Beilfuss
title: Insurer Principal Financial to Buy Fintech Firm

organizations.name: insurer principal financial to buy fintech firm principal financial group inc.

text:
Principal Financial Group Inc. will buy RobustWealth, beefing up its digital capabilities at a time when retirement savers are increasingly opting for robo advisers and index funds.
Des Moines, Iowa-based Principal, an insurance company with $673.8 billion in assets under management, is a big provider of 401(k) plans to employees of small and midsize companies. RobustWealth is a financial technology company based in Lambertville, N.J., that offers automated rebalancing and an open menu of investment options, meaning investors...
